AboutMe: Hey there! I'm Oleksa Sarnatskyi, a skilled Front-End and React developer based in Kyiv. I'm passionate about all things coding and currently, I'm sharing my knowledge and expertise as a React instructor at GoIT and teaching at Djun. In addition, I have experience freelancing and teaching at ROBOCODE. I hold degrees from both Lviv Polytechnic University and Khmelnytsky Polytechnic College. I'm always on the lookout for exciting new challenges and opportunities to collaborate!
